title: Data Science Masterclass for Beginners
headline: Discover if data science is the right path for you by learning about its methodology and more in this free course.
description: Have you ever wondered how businesses use the vast amounts of data they collect and store? This course will introduce you to some of the skills and tools necessary to work with the most valuable resource of today: data. Various topics are covered, including programming languages, data science methodology and collaboration. Take the first steps in getting involved in the vital task of helping organizations make sense of their information.

courseDescription:
Data science can best be described as a process similar to the scientific method: the goal in both is to extract insights from raw facts. It is an interdisciplinary field in that it draws techniques from statistics, mathematics, computer science and other areas. You will learn the skills, tools and necessary considerations to become a part of the data science revolution. This course shows learners the importance of data, the attributes that define big data, and the differences between machine learning and deep learning. You will acquire knowledge of machine learning and its specialized subset - deep learning - as an approach to achieving artificial intelligence. Artificial intelligence (AI) gives reasoning and analytical powers to computers similar to those of the human brain. The four essential programming languages for data science that students should consider learning are Python, R, SAS and SQL. Learners will understand the various factors that should inform their decision of which language to learn. 

In the next part, you will explore data science methodology, an iterative process that starts with business understanding and ends with deployment. You will learn the steps in detail through a realistic case study. After this, you will build a simple chatbot. It is well established that customer service can be a hectic and time-consuming job for the employees of a company. A chatbot is a valuable tool to augment or replace human agents in customer service. After this, you will study GitHub, an online service that helps software development and provides code hosting for various applications. You will learn how to put your files on GitHub, collaborate with your project partners, and keep track of the work to help see changes made to the files. Additionally, you will learn how to organize a project and communicate with your partners on the code-hosting platform.

This course is for learners new to data science and those that want a big picture understanding of the field. It is also helpful for people considering a career change and unsure if data science is the right path. It offers clear and straightforward explanations of topics and divides various processes into discrete and easy-to-follow steps. Data science is expanding and opportunities are everywhere. Organizations worldwide require data scientists, business analysts and other data professionals to collect, process, and make sense of information. Become indispensable to an organization by learning the right skills. Don't miss out on the opportunity to get ahead - join the course now!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will introduce you to data science and its applications. You will gain knowledge of data science concepts, methodology as well as programming languages. Learners will be shown how to extract useful data from large chunks of data and evaluate it. You will learn how to create customer response systems and collaborate online for projects.
